text: Millennium Bridge The Millennium Bridge is a pedestrian bridge over the River Clyde in the city of Glasgow, built as part of the millennium celebrations and funded by the Millennium Commission. The Bridge links the Scottish Exhibition and Conference Centre with the Glasgow Science Centre and Pacific Quay development to the south. The bridge was opened to the public in 2002. ==References== Category:Bridges in Glasgow Category:Pedestrian bridges in Scotland Category:Bridges across the River Clyde Category:Buildings and structures celebrating the third millennium Category:Govan Category:Bridges completed in 2002 Category:2002 establishments in Scotland
title: Millennium Bridge, Glasgow
